languages.text: "Я рвусь в бой, Вольный Торговец! Там, на этой планете, ждет святыня, преклонить колени пред которой я мечтала так долго. И еретики, которые посмели помешать мне сделать это в прошлый визит!"

traits.locale_text: "Я рвусь в бой, Вольный Торговец! Там, на этой планете, ждет святыня, преклонить колени пред которой я мечтала так долго. И еретики, которые посмели помешать мне сделать это в прошлый визит!"

languages.text: "My heart longs for battle, Rogue Trader! I have dreamt of a chance to kneel before the relic for so long, and it's right there, on that planet! And so are the heretics who dared to stop me from doing so the last time!"
languages.original_text: "Я рвусь в бой, Вольный Торговец! Там, на этой планете, ждет святыня, преклонить колени пред которой я мечтала так долго. И еретики, которые посмели помешать мне сделать это в прошлый визит!"

traits.locale_text: "My heart longs for battle, Rogue Trader! I have dreamed of a chance to kneel before the relic for so long, and it's right there, on that planet! And so are the heretics who dared to stop me from doing so the last time!"

"My heart longs for battle, Rogue Trader! I have dreamed of a chance to kneel before the relic for so long, and it's right there, on that planet! And so are the heretics who dared to stop me from doing so the last time!"

"My heart longs for battle, Rogue Trader! I have dreamt of a chance to kneel before the relic for so long, and it's right there, on that planet! And so are the heretics who dared to stop me from doing so the last time!"

languages.text: 「我の心は戦いを望んでいるのです、自由開拓者！聖遺物の前にひざまずくことを長い間夢に見てきたのだ。それがすぐそこにある。この惑星に！そして前回、我が夢を叶えるのを無謀にも止めようとした異端者もいる」
languages.original_text: "My heart longs for battle, Rogue Trader! I have dreamt of a chance to kneel before the relic for so long, and it's right there, on that planet! And so are the heretics who dared to stop me from doing so the last time!"

traits.locale_text: 「我の心は戦いを望んでいるのです、自由開拓者！聖遺物の前にひざまずくことを長い間夢に見てきたのだ。それがすぐそこにある。この惑星に！そして前回、我が夢を叶えるのを無謀にも止めようとした異端者もいる」

languages.text: “我的心渴求战斗，行商浪人！我一直梦想有机会跪在那件圣物前，它就在那里，在那颗行星上！之前阻止我的那群异端分子也在那里！”
languages.original_text: "My heart longs for battle, Rogue Trader! I have dreamt of a chance to kneel before the relic for so long, and it's right there, on that planet! And so are the heretics who dared to stop me from doing so the last time!"

traits.locale_text: “我的心渴求战斗，行商浪人！我一直梦想有机会跪在那件圣物前，它就在那里，在那颗行星上！之前阻止我的那群异端分子也在那里！”

languages.text: « Mon cœur brûle d'en découdre, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Je rêve depuis toujours d'avoir le privilège de m'agenouiller devant la relique, et je sais à présent qu'elle m'attend là-bas, sur cette planète ! De même que les hérétiques qui ont osé m'en empêcher la dernière fois ! »
languages.original_text: "My heart longs for battle, Rogue Trader! I have dreamt of a chance to kneel before the relic for so long, and it's right there, on that planet! And so are the heretics who dared to stop me from doing so the last time!"

traits.locale_text: « Mon cœur brûle d'en découdre, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Je rêve depuis toujours d'avoir le privilège de m'agenouiller devant la relique, et je sais à présent qu'elle m'attend là-bas, sur cette planète ! De même que les hérétiques qui ont osé m'en empêcher la dernière fois ! »

languages.text: «¡Mi corazón ansía la batalla, Comerciante Independiente! Llevo mucho tiempo soñando con la posibilidad de arrodillarme ante la reliquia, ¡y está ahí, en ese planeta! ¡Al igual que los herejes que osaron impedírmelo la última vez!».
languages.original_text: "My heart longs for battle, Rogue Trader! I have dreamt of a chance to kneel before the relic for so long, and it's right there, on that planet! And so are the heretics who dared to stop me from doing so the last time!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi corazón ansía la batalla, Comerciante Independiente! Llevo mucho tiempo soñando con la posibilidad de arrodillarme ante la reliquia, ¡y está ahí, en ese planeta! ¡Al igual que los herejes que osaron impedírmelo la última vez!».

languages.text: "Mein Herz sehnt sich nach dem Kampf, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Ich habe so lange davon geträumt, vor dem Relikt niederzuknien, und es befindet sich direkt auf diesem Planeten! Genau wie die Ketzer, die es gewagt haben, mich beim letzten Mal daran zu hindern!"
languages.original_text: "My heart longs for battle, Rogue Trader! I have dreamt of a chance to kneel before the relic for so long, and it's right there, on that planet! And so are the heretics who dared to stop me from doing so the last time!"

traits.locale_text: "Mein Herz sehnt sich nach dem Kampf, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Ich habe so lange davon geträumt, vor dem Relikt niederzuknien, und es befindet sich direkt auf diesem Planeten! Genau wie die Ketzer, die es gewagt haben, mich beim letzten Mal daran zu hindern!"

languages.text: "Yüreğim savaş uğruna çarpıyor Hür Tacir! O yadigârın önünde diz çöktüğüm günün hayaliyle yaşıyordum. Yadigâr orada, o gezegende! Geçen sefer yoluma taş koyan kâfirler de aynı şekilde!"
languages.original_text: "My heart longs for battle, Rogue Trader! I have dreamt of a chance to kneel before the relic for so long, and it's right there, on that planet! And so are the heretics who dared to stop me from doing so the last time!"

traits.locale_text: "Yüreğim savaş uğruna çarpıyor Hür Tacir! O yadigârın önünde diz çöktüğüm günün hayaliyle yaşıyordum ve orada, o gezegende! Geçen sefer yoluma taş koyan kâfirler de aynı şekilde!"
